CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Desert Camps relative to Ski Lodges?
SRP.A: Desert Camps is {below} Ski Lodges in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total average room price?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Glamping Sites}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total average room price?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Ski Lodges}.

VE.Q: What is Treehouse Retreats's Average Room Price in 2001?
VE.A: Treehouse Retreats's average room price in 2001 is {171.92} $.

VE.Q: What is Glamping Sites's Average Room Price in 1989?
VE.A: Glamping Sites's average room price in 1989 is {313.89} $.

VE.Q: What is City Center Hotels's Average Room Price in 1988?
VE.A: City Center Hotels's average room price in 1988 is {245.04} $.

VE.Q: What are the average room price of City Center Hotels, Desert Camps, and Ski Lodges in 1999?
VE.A: City Center Hotels's average room price is {362.33} $, Desert Camps's average room price is {364.81} $, Ski Lodges's average room price is {50.01} $.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Average Room Price in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum average room price is {6.51} $.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Average Room Price in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum average room price is {596.17} $.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Average Room Price level recorded for City Center Hotels?
EVJ.A: City Center Hotels reached approximately {456.64} $ in {2008}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Average Room Price level recorded for City Center Hotels?
EVJ.A: City Center Hotels's lowest recorded level is approximately {202.35} $ in {1983}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Average Room Price?
SC.A: The average total average room price is {1324.50} $.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Average Room Price go below 1170.98 $? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Average Room Price fall between 1255.83 and 1388.03 $? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Average Room Price exceed 1472.88 $? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1998 and 2001, did the total Average Room Price experience a larger or smaller change than between 1993 and 1997?
NC.A: The change in total average room price between 1998 and 2001 was {smaller} than between 1993 and 1997.

NC.Q: Between 1989 and 1999, was the average total Average Room Price higher or lower than between 1995 and 2001?
NC.A: The average total average room price between 1989 and 1999 was {lower} than between 1995 and 2001.

NC.Q: Between 1986 and 2007, did the total Average Room Price experience a larger or smaller change than between 1987 and 1996?
NC.A: The change in total average room price between 1986 and 2007 was {larger} than between 1987 and 1996.

NC.Q: Between 1998 and 2008, was the average total Average Room Price higher or lower than between 1986 and 2003?
NC.A: The average total average room price between 1998 and 2008 was {higher} than between 1986 and 2003.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Glamping Sites} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Ski Lodges, Treehouse Retreats, Desert Camps, City Center Hotels, Glamping Sites}.
